title: 所有版本均闪退、无法启动游戏，更换启动器也无效。
author: tianak
txt_content:
*** Hello Minecraft! Launcher 2.0.6 ***
*** Invoking minecraft main() ***
There's something wrong when launching or running Minecraft
java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
    at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
    at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
    at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
    at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source)
    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.Launcher.main(SourceFile:84)
Caused by: java.lang.IncompatibleClassChangeError: Implementing class
    at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)
    at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
    at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
    at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
    at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$100(Unknown Source)
    at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
    at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
    at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
    at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
    at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
    at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
    at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:72)
    ... 5 more
Minecraft崩溃了！
java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
 at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
 at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
 at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
 at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source)
 at org.jackhuang.hmcl.Launcher.main(SourceFile:84)
Caused by: java.lang.IncompatibleClassChangeError: Implementing class
 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)
 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
 at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
 at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
 at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$100(Unknown Source)
 at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
 at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
 at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
 at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
 at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
 at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
 at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:72)
 ... 5 more


以上是纯净版1.7.10使用HelloMinecraft!Luancher 启动器的错误代码。
求助
电脑配置没有问题，显卡驱动是最新的AMD14.9。

replies.author: tianak
replies.txt_content:
私情 发表于 2014-10-2 13:42
你重新装个java
你好 JAVA已经重装了5次，JAVA7，JAVA8均试过无效。

replies.author: 私情
replies.txt_content:
tianak 发表于 2014-10-2 13:52
你好 JAVA已经重装了5次，JAVA7，JAVA8均试过无效。
你重装的时候有把java安装目录的文件全部清理干净吗

replies.author: tianak
replies.txt_content:
私情 发表于 2014-10-2 13:53
你重装的时候有把java安装目录的文件全部清理干净吗
嗯 甚至还清理了注册表，还试过换盘安装。我前天还能玩的 昨天开始死机了一次以后就开始这样了，点启动游戏就出现一瞬间然后秒退。

replies.author: tianak
replies.txt_content:

求大侠支招

replies.author: 谞熠韶妍
replies.txt_content: 内存溢出啊，这与你家电脑有多少内存无关，而是在于你给mc分配多少默认是1024，改到500左右或加大试试

replies.author: tianak
replies.txt_content:
谞熠韶妍 发表于 2014-10-2 14:12
内存溢出啊，这与你家电脑有多少内存无关，而是在于你给mc分配多少默认是1024，改到500左右或加大试试 ...
我内存是16G，我一直分配的是4096,512,256都试过了还是这样

replies.author: 最愛
replies.txt_content: 楼主我跟你一样 刚更新14.9 之后就不行了登陆器点击开始 MC出来就闪退
